recommendations: Ankit Parmar “Sparklehood is an active and useful community for mid to senior level professionals, opening them to interesting opportunities. Sparklehood is led by committed & able people Saurabh and Anchal. They are resourceful and supportive through the recruitment process and also after it. All the best to Sparklehood and its team, wishing you greater heights !!”

Kalur Srinivas “Saurabh demonstrated his analytical skills in a short period of time. He has excellent understanding of the requirements of assignments handled and has always exceeded my expectations. He is also a very good team player.”
